Title: requiring local departments of social services to conduct full review of a person's housing history
Summary: Requires local departments of social services to conduct a full review of a homeless person's housing history as part of determining eligibility for shelter at a homeless project.
LawCode: Add ยง44-a, Soc Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the social services law, in relation to determining a homeless person's eligibility for shelter at homeless housing
